snippet: British asset management firms Aberdeen and Standard Life are in talks about a possible merger that could create one of the country's largest fund managers....

headline.main: Malaysia: Ambassador's Expulsion Is a Warning to North Korea
headline.print_headline: Malaysia: Ambassador's Expulsion Is a Warning to North Korea

lead_paragraph: British asset management firms Aberdeen and Standard Life are in talks about a possible merger that could create one of the country's largest fund managers.
